page.title: 11FARMING
page.content:
{WORKING FACILITIES}On the farm there are large barns,sheds and stores.Machinery comprises of 8 tractors,ploughs,a combine harvester and a sprayer.One full-time and one part-time worker is employed. {FARMER'S YEAR} JAN Pick sprouts,leeks.Prune plums. FEB Pick sprouts,leeks.Repairs. MAR Fertilising crops.Spraying APR Fertilising crops.Spraying MAY Sow sprouts,beans and leeks.Mowing JUN Sow sprouts,beans and leeks. JUL Strawberries.Sow winter barley. AUG Pick plums.Ploughing SEP Sow barley. OCT Plant wheat and beans NOV Spray herbicide before crops grow DEC Pick sprouts,leeks.Repairs
{
